member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection
member.summary: A result of detecting the language of a piece of text via or , or the multiple-item equivalents.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.Text
member.summary: The text that was used for the input of language detection.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.Language
member.summary: The language code for the detected language.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Detection.Confidence
member.summary: The confidence level (between 0 and 1) of the detection.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language
member.summary: A language supported by the Google Cloud Translation API.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language.Name
member.summary: The descriptive name of the language, e.g. "English". May be null if no target language was provided when requesting the supported languages.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language.Code
member.summary: The code to use for the language when providing this to the API as a source or target language.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.Language.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The name of the language. May be null.
The code of the language. Must not be null.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.LanguageCodes
member.summary: A helper class with constants for supported language codes. This is simply a code-convenient form of the set of languages returned by . It is regenerated regularly, but not guaranteed to be complete at any moment in time; if the language you wish to use is present in the table but not covered here, please use the listed language code as a hard-coded string until this class catches up.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClient
member.summary: Abstract class providing operations for Google Cloud Translation.

remarks.para: This abstract class is provided to enable testability while permitting additional operations to be added in the future. See , and to construct instances; alternatively, you can construct a directly from a .
All instance methods declared in this class are virtual, with an implementation which simply throws . All these methods are overridden in .

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClient.Service
member.summary: The underlying translation service object used by this client.
member.remarks: The class only provides convenience operations built on top of an existing service object. Any more complex operations which are not supported by this wrapper may wish to use the same service object as the wrapper, in order to take advantage of its configuration (for authentication, application naming etc).

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClient.DefaultModel
member.summary: The default translation model used by this client.
member.remarks: Each Translate method has an optional parameter to override this.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClient.TranslateText(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel})
member.summary: Translates a single item of text synchronously.
member.param: The text to translate.
The code for the language to translate into. Must not be null.
The code for the language to translate from. May be null, in which case the server will detect the source language.
The model to request for translation. May be null, in which case is used.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClientImpl
member.summary: Wrapper around to provide simpler operations.
member.remarks: This is the "default" implementation of . Most client code should refer to , creating instances with , and . The constructor of this class is public for the sake of constructor-based dependency injection.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationClientImpl.ApplicationName
member.summary: The default application name used when creating a . Defaults to "google-cloud-dotnet"; must not be null.
member.remarks: Most applications will never want to set this, which is why it's in this class rather than .

The default translation model to use. Defaults to .

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel
member.summary: Underlying model used by the Google Cloud Translation API. This can be explicitly specified on a per-client or per-method basis.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel.ServiceDefault
member.summary: Explicitly allow the API service to decide which model to use.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel.PhraseBasedMachineTranslation
member.summary: The original translation Phrase-Based Machine Translation model ("base").

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Translation.V2.TranslationModel.NeuralMachineTranslation
member.summary: The Neural Machine Translation model ("nmt") provides higher quality results where available, but is more computationally intensive, leading to slightly higher latency.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.TranslationsResource.ListRequest.FormatEnum
member.summary: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text. A value of "html" indicates HTML and a value of "text" indicates plain-text.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.LanguagesListResponse.Languages
member.summary: List of source/target languages supported by the translation API. If target parameter is unspecified, the list is sorted by the ASCII code point order of the language code. If target parameter is specified, the list is sorted by the collation order of the language name in the target language.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.LanguagesResource.Language
member.summary: Supported language code, generally consisting of its ISO 639-1 identifier. (E.g. 'en', 'ja'). In certain cases, BCP-47 codes including language + region identifiers are returned (e.g. 'zh-TW' and 'zh- CH')

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.LanguagesResource.Name
member.summary: Human readable name of the language localized to the target language.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Format
member.summary: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text. A value of "html" indicates HTML and a value of "text" indicates plain-text.

member.summary: The `model` type requested for this translation. Valid values are listed in public documentation.

member.summary: The input text to translate. Repeat this parameter to perform translation operations on multiple text inputs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Source
member.summary: The language of the source text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to identify the source language automatically and return it within the response.

member.summary: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support.

member.summary: The main language translation response message.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsListResponse.Translations
member.summary: Translations contains list of translation results of given text

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsResource.DetectedSourceLanguage
member.summary: The source language of the initial request, detected automatically, if no source language was passed within the initial request. If the source language was passed, auto-detection of the language will not occur and this field will be empty.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsResource.Model
member.summary: The `model` type used for this translation. Valid values are listed in public documentation. Can be different from requested `model`. Present only if specific model type was explicitly requested.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsResource.TranslatedText
member.summary: Text translated into the target language.
